rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large open space with wheelchair ramps integrated for accessibility, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern living room with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, a central seating area designed following Vastu principles (South-East facing) for energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjacent to the living room, equipped with wheelchair-accessible design and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for ease of movement for wheelchair users with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side, adhering to Vastu's recommendation for energy balance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on ground floor ensuring easy access and floor-to-ceiling windows oriented towards the east (Vastu favorable) for morning light and energy positivity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two guest bedrooms designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind, each featuring ample natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows, placed on the south side to maintain privacy.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area for servants on the ground floor with integrated storage and a compact bathroom, accessible via a separate entrance that respects privacy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Three extra bedrooms designed with floor-to-ceiling windows and wheelchair-accessible features to accommodate extended family or guests.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Modern study area featuring natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, positioned in the North-West section as per Vastu guidelines for creativity and productivity.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: Spacious veranda overlooking the swimming pool area, with easy wheelchair access and floor-to-ceiling design to enhance views.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Modern swimming pool area with a deck and adjacent spa zone; designed to be wheelchair accessible and integrated with open space planning.

rooms.name: Mechanical Room
rooms.description: Room for mechanical systems, utilities, and storage, ensuring easy access for maintenance while adhering to safety norms.
